botcomponent.description:
This capability lists order records from the cr039_orders table, allowing OData filter expressions. For cr039_deliverystatus map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Pending
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
botcomponent.name: List order records with OData filtering options
